summary: The Regulatory Integrity for Gulf Energy Development Act of 2025 (RIGED Act of 2025) aims to ensure the continuity of federal permits for offshore oil and gas activities in the Gulf of Mexico. It directs executive agencies to maintain the terms and conditions of expired permits until new ones are issued, including coordination among federal agencies. The bill also addresses Biological Opinions related to the Endangered Species Act and Marine Mammal Protection Act, deeming compliance with the existing opinion as sufficient until a new one is approved.
